name: No Man's Earth
description:
CREDITS

Miguel López: Programmer and story writter
Jorge Momplet: Game & Audio Designer and Illumination
Paloma Pipeleers: Artist

DESCRIPTION

Metal Gear Solid meets Silent Hill meets Cats!!! Hideo Kojima Wins!

Man's No Earth is a stealth first person game in wich you must have
complete a level without being spotted by cats and use a floppy disk for
save mankind. You gat 3 Ancient Artifacts that can help you in your
mission.

KEY FEATURES

• Stealth mechanics
• Use 'Ancient' Technology against evil cats and save the world!
• 3 different endings

CONTROLS

WASD: Move
Space: Switch Crouch
E: Interact with environment
Left Mouse: Use selected tool
Right Mouse: Run

STORY

Year 2133.

Evil cats have taken the control of all the technology on the Earth and have decimated mankind.

Combined armies of all over the world have been defeated by their own weapons and the terrible but charming cat look.

Every day we are closer to extintion.

However, humans do not give up.

Our infiltrated old women spies have discovered that cats jealously
guard 3 powerfull Ancient Artifacts capable of change the course of the
war.

Only you, a stealthy ninja deprived of any weapon, has a chance of
infiltrate their base, locate the 3 Ancient Artifacts and use it to
defeat the cats once and for all.

You are the last hope of mankind.

KNOWN ISSUES IN ORIGINAL VERSION

• You cannont get batteries :(
• Game boy should help you see in the dark, but...
• It is very difficult!!!

POST-LD VERSION LOG (NOT VALID FOR LUDUM DARE!!!)
